text: Iyara pichata ami ejanara pichata ejanakai amara raachulasakalaka praerana karaicho. Yetiya'i kono jatira ocarata sihamtara raachula ahiche tetiya'i sihamte te'omka asbikara karaiche. Phalata ami sihamtaka etara pichata etakai dhbansa karai kahinita parainata karaicho. Eteke yisakale imana posana nakarae se'ibora sampradayara babe kerala dhbansa'i dhbansa
